channel.title: CVE Feed for Lasso -- Simple URLs – Link Cloaking, Product Displays, and Affiliate Link Management
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Lasso -- Simple URLs – Link Cloaking, Product Displays, and Affiliate Link Management

item.title: CVE-2023-40674|2024-08-02T18:38:51.143Z -- lasso -- simple%20urls%20%E2%80%93%20link%20cloaking%2C%20product%20displays%2C%20and%20affiliate%20link%20management
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Lasso Simple URLs – Link Cloaking, Product Displays, and Affiliate Link Management allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Simple URLs – Link Cloaking, Product Displays, and Affiliate Link Management: from n/a through 118.
